item.title: Nepalese FM in Dhaka to attend Khaleda’s funeral
item.description: Nepalese Foreign Affairs Minister Bala Nanda Sharma arrived in Dhaka on Tuesday night to attend the state funeral of former Prime Minister and Chairperson of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party Begum Khaleda Zia and pay last respects on behalf of the government and the people of Nepal. item.title: Bhutan FM arrives to attend Khaleda’s funeral
item.description: Bhutan’e Foreign Affairs and External Trade Minister Lyonpo D. N. Dhungyel arrived in Dhaka this morning to attend the state funeral of former prime minister and BNP chairperson Begum Khaleda Zia on behalf of his government. He was received at Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport (HSIA) &n

item.title: Jaishankar in Dhaka to pay last respect to ex-PM Khaleda
item.description: External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar arrived in Dhaka on Wednesday to represent the government and people of India at the funeral of three-time former Prime Minister and Chairperson of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) Khaleda Zia. As Delhi believes Khaleda Zia’s vision and legacy

item.title: Pakistan’s Speaker arrives to attend Khaleda Zia’s funeral
item.description: Speaker of Pakistan’s National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq arrived in Dhaka on Wednesday morning to attend the funeral of former prime minister and BNP chairperson Begum Khaleda Zia today, representing the Government of Pakistan. He was received at Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport (HSIA

item.title: Tk 5,000 fine for selling cigarettes near schools, hospitals
item.description: The government has promulgated the Smoking and Tobacco Products Usage (Control) (Amendment) Ordinance, 2025, with a provision of maximum fine of Tk 5,000 for selling cigarettes or tobacco products in areas near educational institutions, hospitals and other sensitive areas. The ordinance was promul

item.title: UAE to pull remaining forces from Yemen in crisis with Saudi Arabia
item.description: The United Arab Emirates said on Tuesday it was pulling its remaining forces out of Yemen after Saudi Arabia backed a call for UAE forces to leave within 24 hours, deepening a crisis between the two Gulf powers and oil producers. Hours earlier, Saudi-led coalition forces had attacked the southern

item.title: Md Nazmul Huda Sarkar promoted to DMD at Midland Bank
item.description: Midland Bank PLC has promoted Md Nazmul Huda Sarkar to the position of Deputy Managing Director (DMD), effective from January 1, 2026, according to a media statement Wednesday. Prior to this promotion, Md Nazmul Huda Sarkar served as Senior Executive Vice President (SEVP) and Chief Technology Offi

item.title: Tamijuddin Textile Mills holds AGM, approves 22pc dividend
item.description: The 42nd Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Tamijuddin Textile Mills PLC was held on Tuesday (December 30), 2025, at Gulshan Club in Gulshan 2, Dhaka. item.title: Managing Director of Notundhora Group receives Global NRB Awards 2025
item.description: Managing Director of Notundhora Group, Dr. Md. Shadi-Uz-Zaman received "Global NRB Awards 2025" in the field of "Visionary Leadership in Real Estate & Community Development" from the Honourable Governor of Bangladesh Bank, Dr. Ahsan H. item.title: India FM Jaishankar meets BNP leader Tarique to convey condolences over Khaleda's death
item.description: India’s External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar has met Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) Acting Chairperson Tarique Rahman in Dhaka to convey India’s condolences following the death of his mother, former prime minister Khaleda Zia. According to a statement posted on the BNP’s of

item.title: Khaleda Zia’s janaza held with tears of lakhs of mourners
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of people on Wednesday offered prayers at Manik Mia Avenue as the namaz-e-janaza of BNP Chairperson and three-time former Prime Minister Begum Khaleda Zia was held, bidding her a final farewell amid waves of grief.
